messageBody:
Hello Everybody,

for some concurrrent Junit tests, I took the classes, which I found on
the Junit Webside: http://www.junit.org/node/589 and
http://mycila.googlecode.com/svn/sandbox/src/main/java/com/mycila/sandbo\
x/junit/runner/ respectively.

My problem is, that with my tests I access some classes, which
schouldn't be accessed concurrently . Therefore I receive some
exceptions, so that I cannot really run the concurrent junit plugin
tests.

Therefore I would like to use a newScheduledThreadPool instead of a
newFixedthreadPool in the classes "ConcurrentJunitRunner" and
"ConcurrentTestsuite":

ScheduledExecutorService executorService =

Executors.newScheduledThreadPool(klass.isAnnotationPresent(Sequential.cl\
ass) ? klass.getAnnotation(
Sequential.class).threads() : (int)
(Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors() * 1.5),
new
NamedThreadFactory(klass.getSimpleName()));

instead of

ExecutorService executorService =

Executors.newFixedThreadPool(klass.isAnnotationPresent(Concurrent.class)
? klass.getAnnotation(
Concurrent.class).threads() : (int)
(Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors() * 1.5),
new
NamedThreadFactory(klass.getSimpleName()));

My Problem is, that I don't find, the place where I should set;

executorService.scheduleWithFixedDelay(command, initialDelay, delay,
unit);

or

executorService.scheduleAtFixedRate(command, initialDelay, period,
unit);

I can set these values in the schedule () method, yet I would like to
set them before I define:

Queue<ScheduledFuture<?>> tasks = new LinkedList<ScheduledFuture<?>>();

Does anybody have an idea, how to modify these classes in that the
concuurent tests don't start at the same time?

For some help I would be grateful.

Kindly
Monika
